description: This file defines the FilterProvider class, a ChangeNotifier-based state management component for handling filter criteria in a Flutter application. It manages filter options such as hair colors, races, religions, and ranges for height and weight, including persistence via a FilterPersistence class.

classes.name: FilterProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages filter criteria, allowing updates, toggling options, persisting state, and notifying listeners in a Flutter UI.

methods.name: _init
methods.description: Asynchronously loads persisted criteria on initialization.

methods.name: _persist
methods.description: Saves current criteria asynchronously, ignoring failures.

methods.name: setCriteria
methods.description: Replaces current criteria with a new set and persists the change.

methods.name: toggleHairColor
methods.description: Toggles or sets membership of a HairColor in the current criteria.

methods.name: toggleRace
methods.description: Toggles or sets membership of a Race in the current criteria.

methods.name: toggleReligion
methods.description: Toggles or sets membership of a Religion in the current criteria.

methods.name: updateHeightRange
methods.description: Updates the height range in the criteria.

methods.name: updateWeightRange
methods.description: Updates the weight range in the criteria.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets criteria to default values and clears persisted state.

methods.name: apply
methods.description: Triggers a placeholder refresh for matching, persists current criteria.
